Reviews.Title: Cheap camera that takes poor quality pics
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I wanted something inexpensive so that I could take pictures of my sewing projects and blog about them.  This fit the bill for being inexpensive, but it has been impossible to take a clear picture.  The flash makes everything very bright and washed out and if you don't use the flash it's blurry.  I have tried using my own lighting but nothing works.  I think I'd need a tripod to take a good picture with this, but that defeats the purpose.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 megapixel resolution
Delivers excellent picture quality. 8.5mm zoom lens
Offers f/3.2 aperture and features an 8x digital zoom. 2.4" color LCD display
Enjoy easy focus selection and photo viewing. Shoot movies
Record movies on this compact camera. Compatible with SD memory cards
ProductInfo.Name: 8 Mp Digital Camera Red
